data.description: Spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bath Tri-Level with quality updates & improvements including exterior custom brick work . Enjoy the peace of mind with a Hi-End Timberline Roof, Beautiful hardwood flooring, newer Pella windows and Doorwall and Encapsulated Crawl. The heart of the home is the custom kitchen, featuring cherry cabinets, granite countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a 3-door fridge, microwave, stove, and dishwasher. The large Great room offers a tranquil view of the park, with a doorwall leading to the covered patio, perfect for entertaining. The mudroom area provides convenient access to the attached garage, which boasts over 500 sq ft of space including a 13x8 workshop, 2 lofts, and a 7x5 garden shed with direct yard access. ***Highest and best due by 7pm tonight, 4/8/2024*** The lower level is a versatile space, ideal for kids, in-laws, or your own enjoyment. Features include a cozy beamed-ceiling family room, a private bedroom/office, and a full bath. Additional updates include a new privacy fence installed in '15, ensuring your backyard oasis remains secluded and serene. Conveniently located just steps away from Nash Park, offering tennis courts and play areas for the whole family. Plus, easy access to schools, expressways, shopping and more. Home Warranty Provided by the Seller.
